messages.die_attacker_msg: You have burned $N to deathy!
messages.die_victim_msg: You have been burned to death by $n!
messages.die_room_msg: $n has burned $N to death!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You miss $N with your burning hands.
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n reaches for you with burning hands, but misses!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n tries to burn $N, but $E escapes!
messages.hit_attacker_msg: You burn $N with your hot little hands!
messages.hit_victim_msg: You cry out in pain as $n grabs you with burning hands!
messages.hit_room_msg: $N cries out as $n burns $M!
messages.god_attacker_msg: Your attempt to burn $N nears BLASPHEMY!!!
messages.god_victim_msg: The pitiful creature before you tries to burn you.
messages.god_room_msg: Unaware of the risks, $n tries to burn $N.

messages.die_attacker_msg: Your lightning bolt kills $N!
messages.die_victim_msg: You are electrocuted to death by a lightning bolt sent by $n!
messages.die_room_msg: The dead body of $N sizzles in the heat from a lightning bolt sent by $n!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: Your lightning bolt scores the ground in front of $N, a misser!
messages.miss_victim_msg: The ground before you is scored as $n misses you with lightning!
messages.miss_room_msg: $N jumps backwards in time to avoid lightning sent by $n!
messages.hit_attacker_msg: You hit $N with your lightning, bullseye!
messages.hit_victim_msg: You are hit by lightning sent by $n, OUCH!
messages.hit_room_msg: $N screams in pain as lightning from $n penetrates $M!
messages.god_attacker_msg: $N stops your lightning with a single gesture, BEWARE!!!
messages.god_victim_msg: You stop $n's lightning with a sure hand, no time for children's games...
messages.god_room_msg: $n's lightning disappears as $N makes a simple gesture.

messages.die_attacker_msg: You chill $N, remember to put flowers on $S grave...
messages.die_victim_msg: You feel chilled by $n and then you feel no more -- R.I.P.
messages.die_room_msg: $n touches $N who slumps to the ground as a dead lump, rather chilly isn't it?
messages.miss_attacker_msg: The atmosphere turns chilly as you miss $N!
messages.miss_victim_msg: You dodge $n and $s chill touch!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n tries unsuccessfully to chill $N!
messages.hit_attacker_msg: You chill $N!
messages.hit_victim_msg: You feel your life flowing away as $n chills you!
messages.hit_room_msg: $n chills $N who suddenly seem less lively!
messages.god_attacker_msg: Are you trying to chill $N? -- what a joke!!
messages.god_victim_msg: $n tries to chill you, what a laugh...
messages.god_room_msg: $N starts to laugh as $n turns chilly!

messages.die_attacker_msg: YOU KILLED $N!!! -- don't you feel ashamed...
messages.die_victim_msg: Your head is filled with all the colors of the rainbow before it bursts!
messages.die_room_msg: $n makes $N into a colorful corpse!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: Your spray of color misses $N -- what a dull world...
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n unsuccessfully tries to add color to your life!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n splashes color everywhere except $N.
messages.hit_attacker_msg: Your own private rainbow hits $N in the face -- WOWIE!!
messages.hit_victim_msg: A sudden burst of colors sends you reeling!
messages.hit_room_msg: $n throws colors at $N who in vain tries to escape!
messages.god_attacker_msg: Your spray of colors turn into butterflies as $N frowns.
messages.god_victim_msg: Your frown is enough to turn $n's color spray into little butterflies.
messages.god_room_msg: The air is filled with butterflies as $N frowns at $n's color spray.

messages.die_attacker_msg: $N is dissolved by your goodness.
messages.die_victim_msg: $n dissolves you, you regret having been so evil, and die...
messages.die_room_msg: $n completely dissolves $N!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: $N is unaffected by your goodness!
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n thinks that $e is really good, and tries to dispel you.
messages.miss_room_msg: $N laughs at $n as $e tries to dispel $M!
messages.hit_attacker_msg: $N shivers and suffers from $S evilness!
messages.hit_victim_msg: $n makes your soul hurt and suffer!
messages.hit_room_msg: $n makes $N's evil spirit shiver and suffer!
messages.god_attacker_msg: Did you really expect $M to suffer?
messages.god_victim_msg: $n unfruitfully tries to dispel you.
messages.god_room_msg: $n is stupid...

messages.die_attacker_msg: The earth opens beneath $N's feet and swallows $M whole!
messages.die_victim_msg: The earth opens beneath your feet and swallows you whole!
messages.die_room_msg: The earth opens beneath $N's feet and swallows $M whole!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: $N desperately tries to keep $S balance as the earth shakes beneath $S feet!
messages.miss_victim_msg: You desperately try to keep your balance as the earth shakes beneath your feet!
messages.miss_room_msg: $N desperately tries to keep $S balance as the earth shakes beneath $S feet!

messages.hit_victim_msg: You fall down and hurt yourself!
messages.hit_room_msg: $N falls down and hurts $Mself!
messages.god_attacker_msg: $N gracefully levitates as the earth shifts beneath $S feet under $M.
messages.god_victim_msg: You gracefully levitate as the earth shifts underneath you.
messages.god_room_msg: $N gracefully levitates as the earth shifts beneath $S feet under $M.

messages.die_attacker_msg: $N crumples as you kill $M by draining $S energy!
messages.die_victim_msg: As $n drains your last energy you look forward to the peace of the graveyard...
messages.die_room_msg: $n drains the energy of $N who crumples as a lifeless cocoon!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You need more draining lessons...
messages.miss_victim_msg: Luckily for you $n slept during draining-lessons!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n fails to drain $N -- what a waste of energy!
messages.hit_attacker_msg: You drain $N of some of $S energy!
messages.hit_victim_msg: You feel less energic as $n drains you!
messages.hit_room_msg: $n drains $N -- what a waste of energy!
messages.god_attacker_msg: You waste energy trying to drain $N!
messages.god_victim_msg: How amusing -- $n tries to drain you!
messages.god_room_msg: $N's eyes twinkle with laughter as $n tries to drain $M.

messages.die_attacker_msg: Your fireball hits $N with full force, causing an immediate death!
messages.die_victim_msg: As you burst into flames of death $n grins evilly...
messages.die_room_msg: The heat from a fireball from $n turns $N into a charred corpse!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: Your fireball blooms few feet before $N who claps $S hands in wonder.
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n aims a fireball at you but it blooms few feet before you; you clap your hands at the show.
messages.miss_room_msg: A fireball from $n misses $N -- what great fireworks around here!!
messages.hit_attacker_msg: You throw a fireball at $N and have the satisfaction of seeing $M enveloped in flames!
messages.hit_victim_msg: You are enveloped in flames from a fireball sent by $n -- OUCH!!
messages.hit_room_msg: $n smirks as $s fireball explodes into the face of $N!
messages.god_attacker_msg: How shameful to throw fireballs at a GOD!!!
messages.god_victim_msg: You choose to ignore $n's shameful attempt to fireball you.
messages.god_room_msg: $n's fireball is tactfully ignored by $N.

messages.die_attacker_msg: As you finish the incantation of the spell, $N falls dead due to the amount of harm $E takes!
messages.die_victim_msg: You feel light headed as $n completes a spell which causes you so much harm that you just snuff it.
messages.die_room_msg: As $n touches $M, $N takes the full brunt of a harm spell and collapses.  Dead.
messages.miss_attacker_msg: Swinging out at $N, you miss and your harm spell goes off harmlessly.
messages.miss_victim_msg: You duck out of the way of $n and $s harm spell misses you.
messages.miss_room_msg: Showing remarkable dexterity, $N avoids $n's reach and subsequent harm spell.
messages.hit_attacker_msg: You watch the pained expression on $N's face as you hit $M with your harm spell.
messages.hit_victim_msg: You grimace in pain as $n's harm spell strikes you.
messages.hit_room_msg: A large grin crosses $n's face as $s harm spell causes $N grievous pain.
messages.god_attacker_msg: Harm a god?  Are you serious?  Of course $N avoids it casually.
messages.god_victim_msg: $n tries to harm you.  Poor sod.
messages.god_room_msg: What a buffoon!  $n looks somewhat perturbed as $N ignores the recently cast harm spell.

messages.die_attacker_msg: Your lightning bolt shatters $N to pieces!
messages.die_victim_msg: You feel enlightened by the lightning bolt $n sends, and then all is darkness -- R.I.P.!
messages.die_room_msg: $N receives the full blast of a lightning bolt from $n... and is no more.

messages.hit_attacker_msg: The lightning bolt hits $N with full impact!

messages.hit_room_msg: $N wavers under the impact of the lightning bolt sent by $n!

messages.god_victim_msg: You move your ears to extinguish $n's lightning bolt.
messages.god_room_msg: $N moves $S ears and $n's lightning bolt is extinguished!

messages.die_attacker_msg: The magic missile tears away the remaining life of $N!
messages.die_victim_msg: You only have time to notice $n uttering strange sounds before everything is dark!
messages.die_room_msg: The magic missile sent by $n causes $N to stagger and collaps in a lifeless heap!

messages.miss_room_msg: $n tries in vain to correct the course of the magic missile meant to hit $N.

messages.god_room_msg: $N starts to roar with laughter as $n sends a magic missile at $M.

messages.die_attacker_msg: $N dies while looking rather shocked!

messages.god_victim_msg: These puny creatures are shocking at times...

messages.die_attacker_msg: $N is dissolved by your evil.

messages.die_room_msg: $n completely dissolves $N!

messages.hit_room_msg: $n makes $N's good spirit shiver and suffer!
messages.god_attacker_msg: Did you really expect $M to suffer?
messages.god_victim_msg: $n unfruitfully tries to dispel you.

messages.die_attacker_msg: $N doesn't recover from your bash! -- $E is dead.

messages.die_attacker_msg: Your kick at $N's kidneys made $M die.

messages.die_attacker_msg: Your kick at $N's face splits $S head open -- yummy!

messages.die_room_msg: $n neatly kicks $N's head into pieces -- YUMMY!

messages.die_attacker_msg: You punch $N in $S kidneys resulting in $S immediate death!
messages.die_victim_msg: You receive a punch in your kidneys which ends your worldly misery -- R.I.P.!

messages.die_attacker_msg: You hit $N with such force that $S neck snaps in two!

messages.die_attacker_msg: You hit $N with a blow that breaks $S spine!

messages.die_attacker_msg: You drive a sting directly into the heart of $N, killing $M!

messages.die_room_msg: $n drives $s sting through $N's chest, killing $M!

messages.god_victim_msg: $n tries to sting you, somewhat comical to tell the truth.

messages.die_attacker_msg: You violently sting $N repeatedly, causing $S death!

messages.miss_room_msg: You watch on as $n stings at $N, but misses!

messages.die_attacker_msg: You whip $N's head right off of $S body!

messages.die_attacker_msg: Your dexterous whip messily tears $N's torso right off!

messages.miss_attacker_msg: You try to bite $N but bite your tongue instead.
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n tries to bite you but bites $s tongue instead!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n tries to bite $N but bites $s own tongue instead!
messages.god_attacker_msg: Aren't you trying to bite off more than you can chew?
messages.god_victim_msg: $n snaps at you but realizes $e is biting off more than $e can chew.
messages.god_room_msg: $n stupidly tries to bite off more than $e can chew by snapping at $N.

messages.die_attacker_msg: You forcefully bludgeon $N whose head suddenly cracks open like a walnut!
messages.die_victim_msg: $n bludgeons your head which cracks open like a walnut!
messages.die_room_msg: $n ruthlessly bludgeons $N whose head cracks open like a walnut!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You fruitlessly try to bludgeon $N.
messages.miss_victim_msg: You easily dodge $n's attempt to bludgeon you.
messages.miss_room_msg: $n tries to bludgeon $N who easily avoids the blow.
messages.god_attacker_msg: Your attempt to bludgeon $N fails, luckily for you $N has a good sense of humor!
messages.god_victim_msg: Your patience is tried when $n tries to clobber you.
messages.god_room_msg: $N restrains $Mself from zapping $n when $e attempts to bludgeon the mighty one.

messages.die_attacker_msg: Your relentless bludgeoning of $N finally results in $S broken neck!
messages.die_victim_msg: $n's relentless bludgeoning of you finally results in your broken neck!
messages.die_room_msg: $n's relentless bludgeoning of $N finally results in $N's broken neck!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You try to bludgeon $N who simply laughs at you.
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n tries to bludgeon you, but you avoid $m and laugh.
messages.miss_room_msg: $N laughs at $n's attempt to bludgeon $M.
messages.god_attacker_msg: Your attempt to bludgeon $N fails, luckily for you $N has a good sense of humor!
messages.god_victim_msg: Your patience is tried when $n tries to clobber you.
messages.god_room_msg: $N restrains $Mself from zapping $n when $e attempts to bludgeon the mighty one.

messages.die_attacker_msg: You crush $N right out of existence!
messages.die_victim_msg: $n crushes you right out of existence!
messages.die_room_msg: $n crushes $N right out of existence!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You try to crush $N who jumps out of the way!
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n tries to crush you but you jump out of the way!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n tries to crush $N who jumps out of the way!
messages.god_attacker_msg: A pox on thee and thy pitiful crush on $N!
messages.god_victim_msg: $n seems to have a crush on you...
messages.god_room_msg: $n seems to have a crush on $N...

messages.die_attacker_msg: You crush $N's entire body, making a terrible mess!
messages.die_victim_msg: $n crushes your entire body, making a terrible mess!
messages.die_room_msg: $n crushes $N's entire body, making a terrible mess!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You hopelessly try to crush $N.
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n hopelessly tries to crush you.
messages.miss_room_msg: $n hopelessly tries to crush $N.
messages.god_attacker_msg: A pox on thee and thy pitiful crush on $N!
messages.god_victim_msg: $n seems to have a crush on you...
messages.god_room_msg: $n seems to have a crush on $N...

messages.die_attacker_msg: You pound $N right into the ground!
messages.die_victim_msg: $n pounds you six feet under.
messages.die_room_msg: $n pounds $N mightily on the head, crushing $S entire body!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You pound at the air as $N nimbly steps out of the way!
messages.miss_victim_msg: You jump out of the way in a panic as $n pounds at you!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n looks perturbed as $s pound misses $N!
messages.god_attacker_msg: You pound $N!  And $E thanks you for it?  *boggle*
messages.god_victim_msg: $n gives you a pound.  Wonder what the exchange rate is...
messages.god_room_msg: $n starts giving pounds to $N who begins to count the money.

messages.die_attacker_msg: You pound on $N with reckless abandon when you realize that $E is dead.
messages.die_victim_msg: With $s reckless pounding attacks, you succumb to death.
messages.die_room_msg: $N falls under $n's pounding blows, yet $n continues $s attack!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You hear the air whistle as you split the air with your pound!
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n pounds in your direction, causing a whistling sound!
messages.miss_room_msg: With a loud whistle through the air, $n misses $s pounding attack upon $N!
messages.god_attacker_msg: Who are you trying to kid?
messages.god_victim_msg: Hmmm... I think you missed the joke that $n was trying to tell you.
messages.god_room_msg: $N looks somewhat perplexed as $n tries to pound him!

messages.die_attacker_msg: You claw $N's face right off!
messages.die_victim_msg: $n claws your face right off!
messages.die_room_msg: $n claws $N's face right off!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You try to claw at $N but miss!
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n tries to claw at you but misses by a hair!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n tries to claw at $N, missing by a hair!
messages.god_attacker_msg: You dummy!  Not the claw, the claw!
messages.god_victim_msg: $n must be crazy - trying to claw at you!
messages.god_room_msg: $n must be crazy - trying to claw at $N!

messages.die_attacker_msg: Your razor-sharp claws rip $N wide open!
messages.die_victim_msg: $n's razor-sharp claws rip you wide open!
messages.die_room_msg: $n's razor-sharp claws rip $N wide open!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You try to claw at $N but almost nick yourself instead!
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n tries to claw at you but nearly nicks $mself instead!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n tries to claw at $N but nearly nicks $mself instead!
messages.god_attacker_msg: You dummy!  Not the claw, the claw!
messages.god_victim_msg: $n must be crazy - trying to claw at you!
messages.god_room_msg: $n must be crazy - trying to claw at $N!

messages.die_attacker_msg: You maul $N across the chest and $E screams in pain as $E falls lifeless to the ground.
messages.die_victim_msg: As $n mauls you in the chest, you feel a searing pain... then nothing.
messages.die_room_msg: With a brutal maul to the chest, $n slaughters $N!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You swing wildly with your maul, almost hitting yourself!
messages.miss_victim_msg: Phew!  $n missed you with $s wild maul!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n mauls at $N, missing wildly!
messages.god_attacker_msg: Mauling a God?  What would your poor mother think?  Of course, you probably wouldn't hesitate to maul her too.
messages.god_victim_msg: $n tries to maul you, and as $e fails, looks quite horrified.  How pleasant.
messages.god_room_msg: $N laughs as $n tries to maul $M.  How comical.

messages.die_attacker_msg: You bring $N within the thrashing of $S life, and then thrash $M one last time, killing $M.
messages.die_victim_msg: $n thrashes you violently, and you die.
messages.die_room_msg: With a horrible thrashing, $N falls lifeless under $n's blows!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You miss your thrash against $N!
messages.miss_victim_msg: What a stroke of luck, $n seems to have missed you with $s thrash!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n thrashes madly at $N, missing $M!
messages.god_attacker_msg: Thrash a God?  More likely that $N would thrash you, don't you think?
messages.god_victim_msg: What a fool, $n tried to thrash you.  *sigh*
messages.god_room_msg: Looking rather silly, $n tries to thrash at $N.

messages.die_attacker_msg: You successfully pierce $N and $S dead body falls to the ground in a lifeless heap.
messages.die_victim_msg: $n pierces you.  You are no longer a living member of this world -- R.I.P.!
messages.die_room_msg: $n pierces $N whose suddenly lifeless body falls to the ground!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You try to pierce $N but pierce the air instead!
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n pierces holes in the air.
messages.miss_room_msg: $n tries to pierce air instead of fighting $N.
messages.god_attacker_msg: The mighty $N begins to think you a nuisance!!!
messages.god_victim_msg: Your patience is almost gone when you stare back at $n.
messages.god_room_msg: The air is loaded when $N angrily wards off a piercing attack from $n.

messages.die_attacker_msg: You pierce $N's heart, you heartbreaker you...
messages.die_victim_msg: $n breaks your heart, goodbye cruel world...
messages.die_room_msg: $n pierces the heart of $N who falls to the ground clutching at the wound!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You lunge at $N without managing to pierce $M.
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n tries to pierce you but fails miserably.
messages.miss_room_msg: $n lunges at $N but can't pierce $M.
messages.god_attacker_msg: The great $N sends you a piercing look, OOPS!
messages.god_victim_msg: You return $n's pierce with a piercing look, hmmm...
messages.god_room_msg: $N returns $n's pierce with a piercing look, hmmm...

messages.die_attacker_msg: You blast $N with all of your might, killing $M!
messages.die_victim_msg: With $s powerful blast, $n tears your life from your body!
messages.die_room_msg: $N falls lifeless as $n's blast rips $M apart!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You blast wildly, missing $N by a mere inch or two!
messages.miss_victim_msg: You skillfully avoid $n's wild blast!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n misses $N with $s wild blast!  What luck $N seems to have!
messages.god_attacker_msg: Are you kidding?  What do you expect your feeble blast to do to $N?
messages.god_victim_msg: $n tried to blast you.  Good thing you have blastproof armour.
messages.god_room_msg: $n looks afraid of the consequences as $e tries fruitlessly to blast $N.

messages.die_attacker_msg: You punch at $N causing $S face to collapse under the blow, blood everywhere.  Doesn't look like $N will recover.  Ever.
messages.die_victim_msg: $n's forceful punch causes you to see red, until you die shortly thereafter.
messages.die_room_msg: $n punches $N right in the face!  There is blood everywhere, and $N seems to be dead!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You miss $N with your haymaker!
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n throws a haymaker at you which whistles by your ear!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n just misses $N with a strong punch!
messages.god_attacker_msg: Punch a God?  May be smarter to punch a wall for a bit.  You might do more damage to it.
messages.god_victim_msg: Is that a quiet whistling noise you hear as $n is swinging $s fist about?
messages.god_room_msg: $n looks like $e would prefer to have punched a wall rather than trying to punch $N.

messages.die_attacker_msg: You stab $N through the heart!  Instant death!
messages.die_victim_msg: $n drives a stab at you, it pierces your heart!  RIP!
messages.die_room_msg: $n stabs brutally at $N, killing him as $N is impaled by $n!
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You stab at $N, missing!
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n misses a particularly nasty stab in your direction!
messages.miss_room_msg: $n stabs at $N!  $e misses!
messages.god_attacker_msg: You stab at $N!  Too bad $E's a god, huh?
messages.god_victim_msg: $n stabs at you!  Lucky for you that you are immune to this kind of thing.
messages.god_room_msg: You watch in pity as $n stabs towards $N missing in the most futile way possible!

messages.die_attacker_msg: You stab forth towards $N, hitting $M in the abdomen causing a messy but mortal wound!
messages.die_victim_msg: $n stabs you in the stomach, and you watch your insides fall out as you die.
messages.die_room_msg: Making a mess of $N, $n kills $M with a stab to the midsection.
messages.miss_attacker_msg: You stab at $N, barely missing $M!
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n stabs at you, missing by a good mile or so!
messages.miss_room_msg: $N grins at $n as the stab sent by $n goes wide!
messages.god_attacker_msg: Gods can't be stabbed, did noone ever teach you that?  And $N just so happens to be one.
messages.god_victim_msg: It sure is nice being a god isn't it... especially since $n can't hit you with $s stabs.
messages.god_room_msg: $n stabs at $N only to discover $N's immunity to stabbing weapons.

messages.die_victim_msg: You feel wounded -- too wounded -- you die...
messages.die_room_msg: $N lies suffering on the ground until no blood is left in $S body.
messages.miss_victim_msg: suffer miss victim - should never see.
messages.miss_room_msg: suffer miss room - should never see.
messages.hit_victim_msg: You lie on the ground suffering from your terrible wounds...
messages.hit_room_msg: $N lies helplessly on the ground and suffers...
messages.god_victim_msg: Suffer god victim - should never see.
messages.god_room_msg: Suffer god room - should never see.

messages.die_victim_msg: You can only lie still as your last heartbeat ebbs...
messages.die_room_msg: $N suffers from bloodlack, and the lack of a beating heart...
messages.miss_victim_msg: suffer miss victim - should never see.
messages.miss_room_msg: suffer miss room - should never see.
messages.hit_victim_msg: You lie on the ground suffering from bleeding wounds...
messages.hit_room_msg: $N lies immobile on the ground, suffering...
messages.god_victim_msg: Suffer god victim -- should never see.
messages.god_room_msg: Suffer god room -- should never see.

messages.die_victim_msg: Poison burns intensely in your veins... you shiver... you die.
messages.die_room_msg: $N screams in pain, keels over and dies.
messages.miss_victim_msg: suffer miss victim - should never see.
messages.miss_room_msg: suffer miss room - should never see.
messages.hit_victim_msg: You feel burning poison in your blood, and suffer.
messages.hit_room_msg: $N looks really sick and shivers uncomfortably.
messages.god_victim_msg: You have become poisoned somehow.
messages.god_room_msg: $N has somehow become poisoned.

messages.die_attacker_msg: $N is killed by fire breath.
messages.die_victim_msg: You are burned to ash, as $n breathes on you.
messages.die_room_msg: $n makes $N to ash.
messages.miss_attacker_msg: $N is missed by fire breath.
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n breathes fire at you, but you avoids it.
messages.miss_room_msg: $N avoids $n's firebreath.
messages.hit_attacker_msg: $N is hit by fire breath.
messages.hit_victim_msg: $n burns you.
messages.hit_room_msg: $N is partly made ash, as $n breaths fire.
messages.god_attacker_msg: $N, being immortal, is just warmed.
messages.god_victim_msg: $n warms you.
messages.god_room_msg: $n warms $N.

messages.die_attacker_msg: $N is killed by gas breath.
messages.die_victim_msg: You die from the gas $n breathes on you.
messages.die_room_msg: $n kills $N with a gas breath.
messages.miss_attacker_msg: $N is missed by gas breath.
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n breathes gas at you, but it has no effect.
messages.miss_room_msg: $N avoids $n's gas.
messages.hit_attacker_msg: $N is hit by gas breath.
messages.hit_victim_msg: $n gasses you.
messages.hit_room_msg: $N is gassed by $n.
messages.god_attacker_msg: $N is immortal, so can't be gassed.
messages.god_victim_msg: $n wants to gas you, but can't.
messages.god_room_msg: $n tries to gas $N, but can't.

messages.die_attacker_msg: $N is killed by frost breath.
messages.die_victim_msg: You are frozen to ice, as $n breathes on you.
messages.die_room_msg: $n makes $N to ice.
messages.miss_attacker_msg: $N is missed by frost breath.
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n breathes frost at you, but you avoid it.
messages.miss_room_msg: $N avoids $n's frost breath.
messages.hit_attacker_msg: $N is hit by frost breath.
messages.hit_victim_msg: $n freezes you with $s breath.
messages.hit_room_msg: $N is partly made ice, as $n breathes frost.
messages.god_attacker_msg: $N is immortal, and thus avoids your frost breath.
messages.god_victim_msg: $n supplies you with air conditioning.
messages.god_room_msg: $n supplies $N with air conditioning.

messages.die_attacker_msg: $N is killed by your acid breath.
messages.die_victim_msg: You are corroded to nothing, as $n breathes on you.
messages.die_room_msg: $n corrodes $N to nothing.
messages.miss_attacker_msg: $N is missed by acid.
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n breathes acid at you, but you avoids it.
messages.miss_room_msg: $N avoids $n's acidbreath.
messages.hit_attacker_msg: $N is hit by acid.
messages.hit_victim_msg: $n corrodes you.
messages.hit_room_msg: $N is corroded as $n breaths acid.
messages.god_attacker_msg: $N is immortal, and thus is immune to acid.
messages.god_victim_msg: $n helps you clean your hands with a little acid.
messages.god_room_msg: $n helps $N cleaning.

messages.die_attacker_msg: $N is killed by your lightning breath.
messages.die_victim_msg: You are killed by $n's lightning breath.
messages.die_room_msg: $n killes $N with a lightning breath.
messages.miss_attacker_msg: $N is missed by your lightning breath.
messages.miss_victim_msg: $n breathes lightning at you, but you avoids it.
messages.miss_room_msg: $N avoids $n's lightning breath.
messages.hit_attacker_msg: $N is hit by your lightning breath.
messages.hit_victim_msg: $n hits you with a lightning breath.
messages.hit_room_msg: $N is hit by $n's lightning breath.
messages.god_attacker_msg: $N is immortal and immune to lightning breath.
messages.god_victim_msg: $n tries to breath lightning upon you.
messages.god_room_msg: $n tries to breath lightning upon $N.
